solution_line_template: In her first year, Tara's dad attended {games_played_per_year}*{attendance_percent_decimal} = <<{games_played_per_year}*{attendance_percent_decimal}={games_attended_first_year}>>{games_attended_first_year} games.

Then, in her second year, Tara's dad attended {games_attended_first_year} - {fewer_games_second_year} = <<{games_attended_first_year}-{fewer_games_second_year}={games_attended_second_year}>>{games_attended_second_year} games.
